prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a handsome man, long emerald green hair, mechanical sniper eyepiece, long white muffler scarf, brown leather flight jacket, wide jawline, focused revengeful eyes
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, detailed leather texture on jacket, metallic texture on the sniper eyepiece, individual green hair strands visible, subtle stubble
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, flat lighting, low quality, blurry eyepiece, bright neon green hair
